DOC.brief_summary: This first-in-children phase 1 trial use indoximod , inhibitor immune `` checkpoint '' pathway indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase ( IDO ) , combination temozolomide-based therapy treat pediatric brain tumor . Using preclinical glioblastoma model , recently show add IDO-blocking drug temozolomide plus radiation significantly enhance survival drive vigorous , tumordirected inflammatory response . This data provide rationale companion adult phase 1 trial use indoximod ( IND # 120813 ) plus temozolomide treat adult glioblastoma , currently open ( NCT02052648 ) . The goal pediatric study bring IDO-based immunotherapy clinic child brain tumor . This study provide foundation future pediatric trial test indoximod combine radiation temozolomide up-front setting patient newly diagnose central nervous system tumor .
